Items.Title: Oversight - “What is the status and progress of the clean-up of petroleum products and the remediation of groundwater, soil and other contaminated materials in the Brooklyn/Queens Aquifer under Greenpoint, Brooklyn, and related petroleum seepage into Newtown Creek?”
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - “What is the status and progress of the clean-up of petroleum products and the remediation of groundwater, soil and other contaminated materials in the Brooklyn/Queens Aquifer under Greenpoint, Brooklyn.
